TRADE: Yarr, What say you about my loot?
MOVE_FLEET: Yarr, I am towing my sails back!
DEFESIVE_PACT: Yarr, Are you interested in defensive pact?
BORDER_WARS: Yarr, scurvy fleet %1$s spotted. Time to die!

Yarr! It would be a shame to scratch your fleet, but that can be avoid by paying this.
Ohoy, looks like you have nice fleet here. Not to lose it will cost for you.
ASK_MOVE_FLEET: Your fleet %1$s has crossed my sector. Please move it away!
OFFER_SPY_TRADE: Yarr, Are you interested in espionage trade for 20 star years?

DECLINE_WAR: Yarr, Prepate to be boarded and destroyed!%1$s
ACKNOWLEDGE_WAR: Yarr, I agree! Now we fight!
DECLINE_ANGER: Yarr, My socks smell better than your offer!
OFFER_REJECTED: Yarr, I'll wait your counter offer then...
ALLIANCE: Yarr, Are you interested in alliance?
TRADE_ALLIANCE: Yarr, Are you interested in trade alliance?
DEMAND: Yarr, Accept this or slice your throat!
HATE_GREET: Yarr, I'll be needing sum rum after this!
INSULT_RESPOND: Yarr, You start getting my nerve!
